RitualOutcomeEffectDef.Name: RV2_RitualOutcome_Base
RitualOutcomeEffectDef.description: Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.

li.label: Terrible
li.description: The {0} was terrible! The speech was stuttering and incoherent, and the vore technique was botched. The predator took far too long to get the prey inside - everyone was waiting for it to end.

li.label: Boring
li.description: The {0} was boring. The speech was repetitive and the vore technique was noticeably flawed. It just didn't feel dignified.

li.label: Satisfying
li.description: The {0} was satisfying. The speech felt meaningful, and the vore technique was precise and dignified.
li.potentialExtraOutcomeDesc: There's a 5% chance that a random participant gets an inspiration.

li.label: Spectacular
li.description: The {0} was spectacular! The speech brought everyone to the edge of a frenzy, and the act of vore was astonishing to watch!
li.potentialExtraOutcomeDesc: There's a 10% chance that a random participant gets an inspiration.

extraPredictedOutcomeDescriptions.li: If the {0} is satisfying, one of the participants might gain an inspiration.
If the {0} is satisfying, the targets belief in the ideoligion will be reinforced.
One of the participants may also gain an inspiration.
One of the participants may gain an inspiration.

li.label: Satisfying
li.potentialExtraOutcomeDesc: There's a 5% chance each, that participants gets an inspiration.

li.label: Spectacular
li.potentialExtraOutcomeDesc: There's a 10% chance each, that participants gets an inspiration.
